outline:
1. heavy, great
    1. heavy
    2. massive, abundant, numerous
    3. heavy, dull
    4. hard, difficult, burdensome
    5. very oppressive, numerous, rich
kjv_def: (so) great, grievous, hard(-ened), (too) heavy(-ier), laden, much, slow, sore, thick.
strongs_def: heavy; figuratively in a good sense (numerous) or in a bad sense (severe, difficult, stupid)
